user.title: Set up Power Saver
user.description: Configure a power saver instance for an appliance. The Nordpool sensor is detected automatically (HACS or native). You can add multiple instances for different appliances.

data_description.name: A descriptive name for this instance (e.g., 'Water Heater', 'Floor Heating').
data_description.min_hours: Minimum number of hours to keep active within each rolling window. The cheapest slots are selected.
data_description.always_cheap_price: Price below which the slot is always activated, regardless of other settings. Set to 0 to disable.
data_description.always_expensive_price: Price at or above which the slot is never activated (safety cutoff). Set to 0 to disable.
data_description.rolling_window_hours: Time window in hours to spread active slots across. Smaller values prevent long inactive gaps. 24 = optimize across the full day.
data_description.price_similarity_pct: Also activate slots within this percentage of the cheapest price. For example, 20% means any slot up to 1.2x the cheapest price is also activated. Useful on flat-price days. 0 = disabled.
data_description.controlled_entities: Entities to turn on/off when state changes. Leave empty to control via your own automations.

error.nordpool_not_found: No Nordpool integration found. Please set up the Nordpool integration (HACS or native) before configuring Power Saver.
error.already_configured: A power saver with this name and sensor is already configured.

abort.already_configured: This power saver instance is already configured.
